name: Lu Shang's Fishing Challenge
description:
There is this quest in Final Fantasy XI Online where you need to acquire 10,000 in exchange for a magnificent fishing rod. 

Getting into game development with Love2D I needed a simple project to figure out architecture and play around with the Lua programming language. Before too long I realized making a game with over 10,000 entities was not going to happen on my first run with the framework but I wanted to bring the project to an end regardless.

After many lessons learned making this I'm ready to move on to the next one!
